ui

Class Terminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.Terminal

  • public class Terminal
extends java.lang.Object
    Headquarter of the application. Identifie the user. Retrieve his reservation. Make it happened or not depend on the manager verification.
    Author:
    Dorian LIZARRALDE
